titles.title: A bill to designate the National Forage Seed Production Research Center in Corvallis, Oregon, as the "Mark O. Hatfield National Forade Seed Production Research Center".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture.
Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 1/28/1987--Introduced. Designates the National Forage Seed Production Research Center in Corvallis, Oregon, as the Mark O. Hatfield National Forage Seed Production Research Center.
